com.github.gianttreelp.bukkitdependencyloader

Class DependencyLoaderPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • com.github.gianttreelp.bukkitdependencyloader.DependencyLoaderPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin 

    public final class DependencyLoaderPlugin
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
    This Plugin offers a way to dynamically load Artifacts at runtime without adding them to a plugin's jar.

    This allows other plugins to reuse artifacts and in turn reduces the file size of many plugins.

    Specification of the dependencies.conf file:

    • Lines that do not start with "artifact=" or "repository=" are ignored.
    • The proper format for an artifact line is:
      artifact=<groupId>:<artifactId>[:< extension>[:<classifier >]]:<version>
    • The proper format for a repository is:
      repository=<id>:<url>
    • For an example, look at this plugin's dependencies.conf

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DependencyLoaderPlugin()
      All the work is kicked of here to make sure the dependencies are loaded before any other plugin is initialized.
